tasks.task: Monitor and adjust fertilizer application based on FCR
subtasks: Measure or monitor FCR (Feed Conversion Ratio) data
Analyze FCR data to determine fertilizer effectiveness
Adjust fertilizer application as needed based on analysis

tasks.task: Participate in market transactions for inputs including North Block Finance Corporation (NBFC) loans or credit
subtasks: Review and discuss input costs and financing options with NBFC
Arrange for financing or loan from NBFC
Utilize funds from NBFC for farm operations, including fertilizer purchases

tasks.task: Check crop yield data and make comparisons
subtasks: Collect and record crop yield data from previous year (e.g., 15,000 kg)
Gather current crop yield data for comparison
Analyze yield data to assess performance and plan future harvests

tasks.task: Operate farm machinery on large scales
subtasks: Drive and operate heavy farming equipment across fields
Manage fuel and maintenance of farm machinery
Ensure efficient operation of equipment for various tasks
